message.body: You passed, but were you surprised? Like, did you think it was not your level when you took it
I'm not too happy about passing.
It's really a bad test since it's multiple choice.
I would wager that I answered most questions by knowing there were 3 wrong answers rather than knowing which was correct.
When I finished the test, I figured that there was a chance that I'd pass if I was lucky.
Ah okay. That's what I was thinking. No writing?
Nope. Writing is were you really get to see your own ability in terms of non-spoken language.
Yeah, my highest score was in listening, just like last time.
And yet I find that the hardest
